Quote rich: This is probably the best analysis of centralised vs decentralised structures in relation to CRO I've ever seen/heard. There is no one-size-fits-all, both structures have their pros & cons.
Job title + Company name: Freelance UX and Conversion Rate Optimisation Consultant

Name: Mark Nuiver
Quote rich: As a relative newbee in the CRO field, the podcast is educational, inspiring and sharpens my vision of my daily work. Thanks for that and I look forward to what is to come!

Name: Michael McMillan
Quote rich: My team and I have been listening to the podcast and love that we found somebody who talks to a subject near and dear to all our hearts. We have a weekly book club meeting and a monthly growth event.  I assign additional training content like the CRO.CAFE podcast out to my org that is discussed as part of those meetings as well.

Name: Simbar Dube
Quote rich: I enjoy the candid interviews, but my personal fav is the discussion with Sean Sheppard, & Andre Morys. Those are definitely knowledge bombs that changed my perspective in behavioral sciences and how I should think as an Optimizer.‍

Name: Sjoerd Walinga
Quote rich: The podcasts are totally worth it if you are interested in CRO and looking for depth and different angles. Pleasant to listen to and valuable to me to listen to.
